title.narrative: Ghana - Development of Senior Secondary Education Project (Education III)
Ghana - Projet de développement des écoles secondaires du deuxième cycle (Education III)

description.narrative: The overall objective of the proposed Education III project is to contribute significantly to improving access to Senior Secondary Schools (SSS) to thousands of Ghanaian Junior Secondary School (JSS) graduates and to enhance the quality of these schools. To this end, its specific objectives are: to (i) facilitate access to Senior Secondary Schools (SSS) of thousands of Ghanaian Junior Secondary School (JSS) graduates; (ii) enhance the quality of secondary education; and (iii) strengthen the institutional management capacity and governance of the Ministry of Education at the central and decentralized levels especially with respect to establishing a centralized and computerized SSS student selection system. Special attention will be given to promoting participation of girls and less privileged pupils.

mailing-address.narrative: African Development Bank Group Headquarters Avenue Joseph Anoma 01 BP 1387 Abidjan 01, Côte d'Ivoire
